title: British dance producer turns an EDM rant from Steve Albini into billboard
text:
British dance producer turns an EDM rant from Steve Albini into billboard 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Electronic music producer Powell rented a billboard to publish rock producer Steve Albini's email, which criticized modern-day EDM. The weir...
